column4: hi folks, ive got a azureus problem... my upload is below 1kB, though it is limited to 100kB. I am seeding ubuntu isos, but this way my share ratio is far from good
this one iso at the moment
somehow my complete network seems to be messed up
azureus just crashed and kicked xchat, too
i have possibly found the error...
can anyone tell how this might come?
i mean how i can find out?
garbage collection or just a crappy java application perhaps
azureus is known to use too much cpu. try qbittorrent instead
no, ubuntu package available at www.qbittorrent.org
well, try qbittorrent, it's qt4 (kde) and easy to use
set it up as default application for .torrent files
how do i set the default application for a file type under ubuntu?
